ygData.subject: Re: Twisting
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I just remapped all my keys to the left side of the keyboard. My right hand never leaves the mouse, my left hand never leaves the left side of the
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 8 Jul 1999, Bob Stewart wrote:
>
> I've tried doing it with the keyboard and like the mouse better.
>
> I've also remapped all my favorite keyboard commands, including the ones
> for the hot buttons, onto the keypad. I play with keyboard shifted left,
> so my left hand is comfortable on the arrow keys and my right on the mouse.
> Then I cruise.

I just remapped all my keys to the left side of the keyboard.
My right hand never leaves the mouse, my left hand never
leaves the left side of the keyboard.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
